title: Home
content: .lab-header-name{ display: inline-block; } .lab-header-name h4{ font-size: 16px; } .lab-header-status{ float:right } .lab-header-status-text{ font-variant: small-caps; } .lab-expected-supplement-settings{ margin-bottom: 10px; border-top: 1px solid #ddd; padding-top: 5px; } .speech-bubble { margin-left: 20px; background: azure; position: relative; padding: 4px 8px; margin: 4px 0px; border-radius: 10px; color:black; display:inline-block } .speech-bubble.warning { background: lightgoldenrodyellow; } .speech-bubble.left-arrow::after { left: 0; top: 50%; content: ''; position: absolute; border: 6px solid transparent; border-right-color: azure; border-left: 0; margin-top: -6px; margin-left: -6px; } .speech-bubble.right-arrow::after { right: 0; top: 50%; content: ''; position: absolute; border: 6px solid transparent; border-left-color: azure; border-right: 0; margin-top: -6px; margin-right: -6px; } .lab-message-sender{ font-style: italic; color:grey; } .lab-open{ } .lab-open-status{ font-variant: small-caps; display: inline-block; position: relative; } .lab-open-status-icon{ display: inline-block; width: 22px; position: absolute; top: -1px; } .lab-open-status-text{ padding-left: 26px; } .lab-button{ margin: 4px 0; display: inline-block; } .lab-button-text{ display: inline-block; } .lab-separator{ display: inline-block; width: 1px; height: 16px; margin-bottom: -4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 1px; } .lab-arrow{ border: solid #FFF; border-width: 0 1px 1px 0; display: inline-block; padding: 4px; margin-bottom: 2px; border-radius: 1px; transform: rotate(45deg) translateY(2px); -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg); } 1. Gymnasieexamen eller motsvarande Väntar på underlag ⏳ + Lägg till handling Sökande avser komplettera Jag går på gymnasiet och skickar in mina betyg så snart jag får dem. Sista kompletteringsdag: Spara // Get the modal var modal = document.getElementById("editModal"); // Get the button that opens the modal var btn = document.getElementById("editBtn"); // Get the element that closes the modal var span = document.getElementsByClassName("close")[0]; // When the user clicks the button, open the modal btn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = "block"; } // When the user clicks on (x), close the modal span.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = "none"; } // When the user clicks anywhere outside of the modal, close it window.onclick = function(event) { if (event.target == modal) { modal.style.display = "none"; } } //Show and hide rolldown button document.getElementById("clickToRolldownBtn").onclick = function() { var rolldownBtn = document.getElementById("rolldownBtn"); if (rolldownBtn.style.display === "none") { rolldownBtn.style.display = "block"; } else { rolldownBtn.style.display = "none"; } }

Sista kompletteringsdag: Spara // Get the modal var modal = document.getElementById("editModal"); // Get the button that opens the modal var btn = document.getElementById("editBtn"); // Get the element that closes the modal var span = document.getElementsByClassName("close")[0]; // When the user clicks the button, open the modal btn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = "block"; } // When the user clicks on (x), close the modal span.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = "none"; } // When the user clicks anywhere outside of the modal, close it window.onclick = function(event) { if (event.target == modal) { modal.style.display = "none"; } } //Show and hide rolldown button document.getElementById("clickToRolldownBtn").onclick = function() { var rolldownBtn = document.getElementById("rolldownBtn"); if (rolldownBtn.style.display === "none") { rolldownBtn.style.display = "block"; } else { rolldownBtn.style.display = "none"; } }
